entry.value: library(deSolve)%%00010%%00010logistB <- function(t, x, parms) {%%00010 with(as.list(parms), {%%00010 Temp <- Tempprofile(t)%%00010 %%00010 H1 <- exp(-6.8346 + 12817 / (Temp + 273.15) - 3766800 / (Temp + 273.15) ^ 2 + 2.997e8 / (Temp + 273.15) ^ 3) # Henrys's constant%%00010 H2 <- 101323 * 2.4429 / H1 # Henrys's constant%%00010 CO2 <- CO2equilibrium * H2 / 100%%00010 %%00010 ## Conversion of factor's units to the ones used in the equations%%00010 # CO2%%00010 H1 <- exp(-6.8346 + 12817 / (Temp + 273.15) - 3766800 / (Temp + 273.15) ^ 2 + 2.997e8 / (Temp + 273.15) ^ 3) # Henrys's constant%%00010 H2 <- 101323 * 2.4429 / H1 # Henrys's constant%%00010 CO2 <- CO2equilibrium * H2 / 100%%00010%%00010 # water activity %%00010 aw <- 0.999489 - 0.005179 * NaCl - 0.0001272 * NaCl ^ 2%%00010 %%00010 # Organic acids%%00010 AA_total_mM <- AA_wph / 60.05%%00010 AACu <- AA_total_mM / (1 + 10 ^ (pH - 4.76))%%00010 BA_total_mM <- BA_wph / 122.12%%00010 BACu <- BA_total_mM / (1 + 10 ^ (pH - 4.19))%%00010 CA_total_mM <- CA_wph / 192.13%%00010 CACu <- CA_total_mM / (1 + 10 ^ (pH - 3.13))%%00010 DA_total_mM <- DA_wph / 119.1%%00010 DACu <- DA_total_mM / (1 + 10 ^ (pH - 4.76))%%00010 LA_total_mM <- LA_wph / 90.08%%00010 LACu <- LA_total_mM / (1 + 10 ^ (pH - 3.86))%%00010 SA_total_mM <- SA_wph / 112.1%%00010 SACu <- SA_total_mM / (1 + 10 ^ (pH - 4.76))%%00010 %%00010 ## Equations for phi terms for each environmental parameter%%00010 phi_temp <- (1 - ((Temp + Tmin) / (Tref + Tmin))) ^ 2%%00010 phi_aw <- (1 - sqrt((aw - awmin) / (1 - awmin))) ^ 2%%00010 phi_pH <- (1 - sqrt(1 - 10 ^ (pHmin - pH))) ^ 2%%00010 phi_phenol <- (1 - sqrt((P_max - P) / P_max)) ^ 2%%00010 phi_NIT <- (1 - ((NITmax - NIT) / NITmax)) ^ 2%%00010 phi_CO2 <- (1 - sqrt((CO2max - CO2) / CO2max)) ^ 2%%00010 phi_acids <- (1 - ((1-sqrt(LACu/MIC_LACu)) * (1-sqrt(DACu/MIC_DACu)) * (1-sqrt(AACu/MIC_AACu)) *%%00010 (1-(BACu/MIC_BACu)) * (1-(CACu/MIC_CACu)) * (1-(SACu/MIC_SACu)))) ^ 2%%00010 %%00010 ##Equations for phi terms for each environmental parameter%%00010 # cartesian product with all environmental parameters: (total 7 phi calculated)%%00010 # (1-phi_temp)*(1-phi_aw)*(1-phi_pH)*(1-phi_phenol)*(1-phi_NIT)*(1-phi_CO2)*(1-phi_acids)%%00010 psi_temp <- phi_temp/((1-phi_aw)*(1-phi_pH)*(1-phi_phenol)*(1-phi_NIT)*(1-phi_CO2)*(1-phi_acids))%%00010 psi_aw <- phi_aw/((1-phi_temp)*(1-phi_pH)*(1-phi_phenol)*(1-phi_NIT)*(1-phi_CO2)*(1-phi_acids))%%00010 psi_pH <- phi_pH/((1-phi_temp)*(1-phi_aw)*(1-phi_phenol)*(1-phi_NIT)*(1-phi_CO2)*(1-phi_acids))%%00010 psi_phenol <- phi_phenol/((1-phi_temp)*(1-phi_aw)*(1-phi_pH)*(1-phi_NIT)*(1-phi_CO2)*(1-phi_acids))%%00010 psi_NIT <- phi_NIT/((1-phi_temp)*(1-phi_aw)*(1-phi_pH)*(1-phi_phenol)*(1-phi_CO2)*(1-phi_acids))%%00010 psi_CO2 <- phi_CO2/((1-phi_temp)*(1-phi_aw)*(1-phi_pH)*(1-phi_phenol)*(1-phi_NIT)*(1-phi_acids))%%00010 psi_acids <- phi_acids/((1-phi_temp)*(1-phi_aw)*(1-phi_pH)*(1-phi_phenol)*(1-phi_NIT)*(1-phi_CO2))%%00010 %%00010 psi <- (psi_temp + psi_aw + psi_pH + psi_phenol + psi_NIT + psi_CO2 + psi_acids) / 2%%00010 %%00010 xi <- ifelse(psi>=1, 0, ifelse(psi<=0.5, 1, ((1-psi)*2)))%%00010 %%00010 mmax <- b*((Temp-Tmin2)/(Tref-Tmin2))^2*((aw-awmin)/(1-awmin))*(1-10^(pHmin-pH))*(1-(LACu/MIC_LACu))*%%00010 ((P_max-P)/P_max)*((NITmax-NIT)/NITmax)^2*((CO2max-CO2)/CO2max)*(1-sqrt(DACu/MIC_DACu))*%%00010 (1-sqrt(AACu/MIC_AACu))*(1-(BACu/MIC_BACu))*(1-(CACu/MIC_CACu))*(1-(SACu/MIC_SACu))*xi%%00010 %%00010 dx <- mmax * x[1] * (1 - x[1]/Nmax)%%00010 list(dx,mmax=mmax, Temp=Temp)%%00010 })%%00010}%%00010%%00010%%00010#setwd("~/FSSP/Listeria growth model non-isothermical conditions")%%00010 %%00010# This are different temperature/time profiles that I'm testing (the files are send as an attachment to the email)%%00010%%00010# You have to choose one of them to continue %%00010%%00010# Temperature/time profiel 1%%00010Temp_profile <- read.table("Temp_profile.txt", header=TRUE)%%00010%%00010time <- seq(from = 0, to = 316, by = 2)%%00010Tempprofile <- approxfun(Temp_profile) %%00010%%00010# Temperature/time profiel 2%%00010Temp_profile <- read.table("Temp_profileFSSP.txt", header=TRUE)%%00010time <- seq(from = 0, to = 1270, by = 5)%%00010Tempprofile <- approxfun(Temp_profile) %%00010%%00010parms <- c(Ni = N0, NaCl = NaCl, pH = pH, P = P, CO2equilibrium = CO2equilibrium, %%00010 NIT = NIT, AA_wph = AA_wph, BA_wph = BA_wph, CA_wph = CA_wph, DA_wph = DA_wph,%%00010 LA_wph = LA_wph, SA_wph = SA_wph)%%00010x <- c(N = N0)

# Parameters from logistB%%00010# TODO: Temp is not included here yet since it is generated with a function (Tempprofile)%%00010Tmin <- 2.83 # °C%%00010Tref <- 25 # °C%%00010awmin <- 0.923 %%00010pHmin <- 4.97 %%00010P_max <- 32 # ppm %%00010NITmax <- 350 # ppm %%00010CO2max <- 3140 # ppm %%00010MIC_LACu <- 3.79 # MICs of concentrations (mM) of undissociated lactic acid%%00010MIC_DACu <- 4.8 # MICs of concentrations (mM) of undissociated diacetate%%00010MIC_AACu <- 10.3 # MICs of concentrations (mM) of undissociated acetic acid%%00010MIC_BACu <- 0.349 # MICs of concentrations (mM) of undissociated benzoic acid%%00010MIC_CACu <- 2.119 # MICs of concentrations (mM) of undissociated citric acid%%00010MIC_SACu <- 1.896 # MICs of concentrations (mM) of undissociated sorbic acid%%00010mmaxref <- 0.417 # 1/h %%00010Nmax <- 3.18E8 # cfu/g%%00010RLT <- 4.5 # Relative lag time (days)%%00010b <- 0.41899729%%00010Tmin2 <- -2.83%%00010%%00010# Product characteristics%%00010N0 <- 1%%00010NaCl <- 4%%00010pH <- 6.2%%00010P <- 10%%00010CO2equilibrium <- 0%%00010NIT <- 0%%00010AA_wph <- 0%%00010BA_wph <- 0%%00010CA_wph <- 0%%00010DA_wph <- 0%%00010LA_wph <- 0%%00010SA_wph <- 0

par(mfrow=c(2,2))%%00010%%00010## both "out" are the same %%00010print(out <- as.data.frame(rk4(x, time, logistB, parms)))%%00010print(out <- as.data.frame(ode(x, time, logistB, parms, method = rkMethod("rk4"))))%%00010%%00010## To plot the results %%00010plot((out$time)/24, log10(out$N), ylim = c(0, 10), xlim = c(0, 60),%%00010 type = "l", col = "red", lwd = 2)%%00010plot((out$time)/24, out$mmax, ylim = c(0, .05), xlim = c(0, 60),%%00010 type = "l", col = "red", lwd = 2)%%00010plot((out$time)/24, out$Temp, ylim = c(0, 15), xlim = c(0, 60),%%00010 type = "l", col = "red", lwd = 2)
